title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is opened and the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints or marks. However, in the current version (Photon), the popup menu does not appear.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected result is a popup menu to appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks, as mentioned above. However, in the current version (Photon), the popup menu does not appear.
